001/*

006
007package renderer.models_T;
008
009import renderer.scene.*;
010import renderer.scene.primitives.*;
011import renderer.scene.util.MeshMaker;
012
013/**
014   Create a solid model of a Sierpinski Sponge centered at the origin.
015<p>
016   See <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sierpi%C5%84ski_triangle#Analogues_in_higher_dimensions" target="_top">
017                https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sierpi%C5%84ski_triangle#Analogues_in_higher_dimensions</a>
018*/
019public class SierpinskiSponge extends Model implements MeshMaker
020{
021   final int n;
022
023   /**
024      Create a Sierpinski Sponge centered at the origin
025      using five recursive iterations.
026   */
027   public SierpinskiSponge()
028   {
029      this(5);
030   }
031
032
033   /**
034      Create a Sierpinski Sponge centered at the origin
035      using {@code n} recursive iterations.
036
037      @param n  number of recursive iterations
038      @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code n} is less than 0
039   */
040   public SierpinskiSponge(final int n)
041   {
042      super(String.format("Sierpinski_Sponge(%d)", n));
043
044      if (n < 0)
045         throw new IllegalArgumentException("n must be greater than or equal to 0");
046
047      this.n = n;
048
049      if (0 == n)
050      {
051         // Create a tetrahedron geometry.
052         // It has 4 vertices and 6 edges.
053         addVertex(new Vertex( 1,  1,  1),
054                   new Vertex(-1,  1, -1),
055                   new Vertex( 1, -1, -1),
056                   new Vertex(-1, -1,  1));
057
058         // Create four triangular faces.
059         addPrimitive(new Triangle(3, 1, 0),
060                      new Triangle(3, 2, 1),
061                      new Triangle(3, 0, 2),
062                      new Triangle(0, 1, 2));
063      }
064      else
065      {
066         addNestedModel(subSponges(n - 1,  1,  1,  1),
067                        subSponges(n - 1, -1,  1, -1),
068                        subSponges(n - 1,  1, -1, -1),
069                        subSponges(n - 1, -1, -1,  1));
070      }
071   }
072
073
074   /**
075      Recursive helper function.
076      <p>
077      This function builds the four sub models needed
078      for one recusive step.
079
080      @param n    number of recursive iterations
081      @param pmX  plus or minus 1 for x-direction
082      @param pmY  plus or minus 1 for y-direction
083      @param pmZ  plus or minus 1 for z-direction
084      @return     {@link Model} holding sub tree of sponges
085   */
086   private Model subSponges(final int n,
087                            final int pmX, final int pmY, final int pmZ)
088   {
089      assert (n >= 0);
090
091      final Model model =
092         new Model("Sierpinski Sponge: level "+n+" ("+pmX+", "+pmY+", "+pmZ+")",
093                   Matrix.translate(pmX*0.5, pmY*0.5, pmZ*0.5)
094            .times(Matrix.scale(0.5, 0.5, 0.5)));
095
096      if (0 == n) // stop the recursion
097      {
098         // Create a tetrahedron geometry.
099         // It has 4 vertices and 6 edges.
100         model.addVertex(new Vertex( 1,  1,  1),
101                         new Vertex(-1,  1, -1),
102                         new Vertex( 1, -1, -1),
103                         new Vertex(-1, -1,  1));
104
105         // Create four triangular faces.
106         model.addPrimitive(new Triangle(3, 1, 0),
107                            new Triangle(3, 2, 1),
108                            new Triangle(3, 0, 2),
109                            new Triangle(0, 1, 2));
110      }
111      else
112      {
113         model.addNestedModel(subSponges(n - 1,  1,  1,  1),
114                              subSponges(n - 1, -1,  1, -1),
115                              subSponges(n - 1,  1, -1, -1),
116                              subSponges(n - 1, -1, -1,  1));
117      }
118      return model;
119   }
120
121
122
123   // Implement the MeshMaker interface (three methods).
124   @Override public int getHorzCount() {return n;}
125
126   @Override public int getVertCount() {return n;}
127
128   @Override
129   public SierpinskiSponge remake(final int n, final int k)
130   {
131      final int newN;
132      if (n != this.n)
133         newN = n;
134      else
135         newN = k;
136      return new SierpinskiSponge(newN);
137   }
138}//SierpinskiSponge
